text: you can use these library in free and commercial projects without a fee
no charge should be made for providing these library to a third party
it is allowed to modify the source to fit your special needs
if you made improvements you should make it public available by sending us your modifications or publish it on your site
if you publish it on your own site you have to notify us
this is not a commitment that we include your modifications
this copyright notice must be included in the modified source code
